sen.j: 享徳元年（1452年）に右中弁、翌年には左中弁・蔵人頭・右大弁と転じて享徳3年（1454年）に参議。
sen.e: He was transferred to Uchuben (Middle Controller of the Right) in 1452 and Sachuben (middle controller of the left), Kurodo no to (Head Chamberlain) and Udaiben (Major Controller of the Right) in the following year, and he was promoted to Sangi (councilor) in 1454.

sen.j: 武家伝奏のみならず、後土御門天皇・後柏原天皇両天皇の乳母や二条政嗣室を娘に持つなど、宮廷にも強い人脈を有した。
sen.e: In addition to the position of buke tenso, he had a strong human network through his daughters such as menoto (a woman providing breast-feed to a highborn baby) of the Emperor Gotsuchimikado and the Emperor Gokashiwabara and a wife of Masatsugu NIJO.
